definitions.text: any very large body of (salt) water
a principal pipe in a system that distributes water or gas or electricity or that collects sewage

examples: the main doors were of solid glass

definitions.text: (of a clause) capable of standing syntactically alone as a complete sentence
examples: the main (or independent) clause in a complex sentence has at least a subject and a verb

definitions.text: of force; of the greatest possible intensity
